mapper.select: select h.* from o2_home h, o2_user u where h.u_num=u.num and u.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update o2_home set home_name=#{home_name}, addr=#{addr}, hp=#{hp}, person=#{person}, emer_hp=#{emer_hp}, intro=#{intro}, tag=#{tag}, sub_tag=#{sub_tag}, img=#{img}, facilities=#{facilities}, sub_facilities=#{sub_facilities}, price=${price} where num=#{num}
